snippet: Our colleagues at the Bits technology blog have the news that Twitter is suing the federal government, seeking to disclose more information about how many personal-data requests it receives from government agencies.
abstract: Our colleagues at the Bits technology blog have the news that Twitter is suing the federal government, seeking to disclose more information about how many personal-data requests it receives from government agencies.

headline.main: From Bits: Twitter Sues Uncle Sam Over Data Requests
